p:
In the case of Penicillium sp., the values of MIC were close to those reported by Stupar et al.
35 , who obtained MICs in the range of 0.2–1.0 μg/ml for the same fungal genus. For Cladosporium sp., the obtained MICs were higher than those found by Zabka et al.
36 for Cladosporium cladosporoides (0.028–0.066 μg/ml). For Fusarium sp., Daferera et al.
37 and Stević et al.
38 found MICs of 150 μg/ml and 70–1160 μg/ml of oregano essential oil, respectively, values much higher than those presented in this study.
